lines: Kunyina izina limbi, lili mbuli lya Jesu
Likomanisya ba ngele, Lila tu komanisya.
Kunyina izina limbi, No upengele moyo,
Kunyina izina limbi, No ukomene moyo.
Ndila syoma ku mu bona, Naya kubola ansi,
Ndila syoma kumvwa ijwi, Koku kundi sekesya.
Nkubotu ku mu nyonena, Mu munda wakwe muno,
Nkubotu kuti a lele, Milimo yangu yonse.
